name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
bio: An experienced cardiologist focused on preventive and interventional heart care.

name: Dr. Ali Khan
bio: Specializes in childhood vaccinations, growth tracking, and common pediatric diseases.

bio: Experienced in treating fever, infections, and chronic diseases like diabetes.
